Class.name: SyncTool.Callback
Class.Description: Subclass this class to implement callbacks for long running tasks and watch their progress

Property.name: ParentJob
Property.Description: Holds the parent job number in jobbed task.

Method.name: RefreshSelectedItems
Method.Description: This method is called when selected items are refreshed

Method.name: Synchronize
Method.Description: This method is called when files are synchronized

Method.name: Import
Method.Description: This method is called when files are imported

Method.name: Export
Method.Description: This method is called when items are exported to files

Method.name: SetCompileLogFile
Method.Description: This method is called before items are compiled. iFile contains the file name to which the compiler logs his output.
